reviews.review_msg: A TRUE GEM... I WISH EVERY PROF WAS JAMIE RENNIE!!!! YOU SIR AN ICON!! HAVE A GREAT SUMMER WITH YOUR BEAUTIFUL FAMILY AND NEW BORN BABY

Great lecturer, I found it was incredibly helpful to actually go to his class and take notes, he condenses the material down well and gives you what matters, despite this course covering a lot of ground. Also a fun game: count how many times he says trilingual puns during the semester, take a shot for each one. Youll be on the floor drunk��

His classes are an easy A but be prepared to be bombarded by subtle far left borderline communist propaganda. Not a joke he doesn't seem to have an original idea in his head just repeating what he has gotten from his time in the broken Uni system.
He's the most relaxed professor . I thought he was a fair marker and I really enjoyed learning from him. Readings were interesting. I highly recommend Jamie
